content: this is my quick and easy cowl for the holidays or any day with the temperature at 25 degrees outside this cowl sits close to the neck and keeps you warm and toasty the cowl is a bandana style and uses 95 - 105 yards of super bulky yarn it s knit in the round and uses basic stitches the cowl is made out of 34 rounds and can be made very quickly and inexpensively did i mention it uses 1 skein or less
